attributes.action: Encourage the reduction of plastic bags in Yorkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want people to stop for a moment and think before they go out, and get into a routine where they take shopping bags along with them. We want to follow the example set by residents and traders in Hebden Bridge and fight for change on our doorstep in Leeds and Bradford.

We are kicking off an anti plastic bag crusade across the region by appearing in a huge ‘bag for life’.

Approach PR are using their PR and media communication skills for an eco friendly campaign.

Working in Little Germany, Bradford we've made an outsize shopper to kick off our ‘Don’t Get Carried Away’ campaign to rid the district of plastic bags.
We're very conscious of what is happening in the world. We feel the environment is being adversely affected by the unnecessary use of plastic carrier bags and it is so easy to change by simply not using them as part of your daily routine.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
